text.one_time_effect: Requires -6°C or warmer. Decrease any plant production 1 step. 1 VP per 2 animals on this card.

text.action_or_effect: Action: Spend 1 titanium to add 2 floaters to this card, or spend 2 floaters here to increase your TR 1 step.
Action: Add 1 floater to ANY JOVIAN CARD, or spend 1 floater here to trade for free
text.one_time_effect: Add 2 foaters to ANY JOVIAN CARD.

text.action_or_effect: Action: Add 2 floaters to ANY JOVIAN CARD, or spend any number of floaters here to gain the same number of titanium.
Effect: When you trade, you may first increase that Colony Tile track 1 step.
Effect: When you trade, you may first increase that Colony Tile track 1 step.
text.one_time_effect: Place a colony.
Requires that you have 1 city tile and 1 colony in play. Increase your plant production 1 step, and add 2 microbes to ANOTHER card.

text.action_or_effect: Effect: When you play a space tag, you pay 4 MC less for it.
text.one_time_effect: Requires 5 science tags.
Increase your MC production 4 steps. Gain 3 MC.
Place an ocean tile. Increase your energy production 2 steps. Remove 3 MC.
Increase your plant production and energy production 1 step each. Gain 2 plants.
Increase your plant production 1 step. Draw 3 cards.
Decrease your MC production 1 step. Increase your plant production 2 steps.
Increase your MC production 6 steps. Remove 6 MC.
Increase your plant production 1 step. Increase your MC production 2 steps.
Gain 21 MC.
Place a city tile. Increase your plant production 1 step.
Increase your plant production 1 step. Play a card from Hand, ignoring global requirements
Play a card from hand, reducing its costs by 25 MC
Place a greenery tile and increase oxygen 1 step. Reveal cards from the deck until you have revealed 2 plant-tag cards. Take these into your hand, and discard the rest.
Increase your titanium production 2 steps. Remove 5 MC.
Place 2 ocean tiles.
Raise temperature 3 steps. Remove 5 MC.
Increase your titanium production 1 step. Draw 1 card.
Decrease your MC production 2 steps. Gain 30 MC.
Increase your energy production and steel production 1 step each. Gain 6 MC.
Raise temperature 1 step. Gain 4 titanium, and 4 steel.
Increase your MC production, steel production, and titanium production 1 step each.
Increase your steel production 2 steps. Gain 4 steel.
Increse your heat production 3 steps. Gain 3 heat.
Increase your steel production 1 step, and your heat production 2 steps. Gain 2 heat.
Raise your terraform rating 1 step. Increase your plant production 1 step. Gain 5 MC.
Increase your titanium produciton [sic] 1 step. Gain 4 titanium.
Place 1 ocean tile. Increase your heat production 2 steps.
Increase your energy production 3 steps.
Draw 3 cards, and increase your MC production 1 step. After being played, when you perform an action, the wild tag is any tag of your choice.
Place a city tile. Increase your MC production 2 steps.
Raise oxygen 2 steps. Gain 5 steel.
Decrease your MC production  1 step. Increase your plant production, energy production, and heat production 1 step each.
Increase your energy production 2 steps. Gain 4 steel.
Gain 3 titanium, 8 steeel, and 3 plants.
Raise your terraform rating 3 steps. Draw 1 card.
Gain 6 titanium. Reveal cards from the deck until you have revealed 2 space cards. Take those into hand, and discard the rest.
Increase your steel production 1 step.
Decrease your energy production 1 step. Increase your MC production 2 steps. Place a city tile ON A VOLCANIC AREA, same as Lava Flows, regardless of adjacent cities.
Oxygen must be 4% or lower. Draw 2 cards.

text.action_or_effect: Action: Add a microbe to this card. Effect: When paying for a plant card, microbes here may be used as 2 MC each.
text.one_time_effect: Requires temperature -20°C or colder.
After being played, when you perform an action, the wild tag counts as any tag of your choice.
Draw 1 card.
Requires 2 Earth tags. Increase your MC production 4 steps.

text.action_or_effect: Effect: After you pay for a card or standard project with a basic cost of 20 MC or more, you gain 4 MC.
text.one_time_effect: You start with 57 MC.

text.action_or_effect: Effect: You may always pay 7 plants, instead of 8, to place 1 greenery.
text.one_time_effect: You start with 2 plant production, 3 plants, and 36 MC.

text.action_or_effect: Effect: You may use heat as MC. You may not use MC as heat.
text.one_time_effect: You start with 3 heat production and 42 MC.

text.action_or_effect: Effect: Each time you play an event, you gain 2 MC.
text.one_time_effect: You start with 20 steel and 30 MC.

text.action_or_effect: Effect: Your temperature, oxygen, and ocean requirements are +2 or -2 steps, your choice in each case.
text.one_time_effect: As your first action in the game, draw 3 cards. Start with 45 MC.

text.action_or_effect: Effect: Each time you get any steel or titanium as a placement bonus on the map, increase your steel production 1 step.
text.one_time_effect: The earliest private enterprises on Mars focused on mining and exporting minerals off the surface. As the mega-corporations arrive to terraform, the miners unite in the Guild to defend their interests. With their expertise and knowledg of the planet they will be a worthy contender in the race.

text.action_or_effect: Effect: Each time any Jovian tag is put into play, including this, increase your MC production 1 step.
text.one_time_effect: You start with 1 titanium production and 42 MC.

text.action_or_effect: Effect: Your titanium resources are each worth 1 MC extra.
text.one_time_effect: You start with 10 titanium and 23 MC

text.action_or_effect: Effect: When playing an Earth card, you pay 3 MC less for it.
text.one_time_effect: You start with 60 MC.

text.action_or_effect: Effect: When any city tile is placed ON MARS, increase your MC production 1 step. When you place a city tile, gain 3 MC.
text.one_time_effect: You start with 40 MC. As your first action in the game, place a city tile.

text.action_or_effect: Effect: When playing a power card OR THE STANDARD PROJECT POWER PLANT, you pay 3 MC less for it.
text.one_time_effect: You start with 1 energy production and 48 MC.

text.action_or_effect: Action: If your Terraform Rating was raised this generation, you may pay 3 MC to raise it 1 step more.
text.one_time_effect: You start with 40 MC.

text.action_or_effect: Effect: Whenever Venus is terraformed 1 step, you gain 2 MC.
text.one_time_effect: You start with 47 MC and 1 plant production.

text.action_or_effect: Action: Add a floater to ANY card.
text.one_time_effect: You start with 42 MC. As your first action, reveal cards from the deck until you have revealed 2 cards with a floater icon on it. Take those 2 cards into hand, and discard the rest. 1 VP per 3 floaters on this card.

text.action_or_effect: Effect: For each step you increase the production of a resource, including this, you also gain that resource.
text.one_time_effect: You start with 1 steel production and 35 MC.

text.action_or_effect: Effect: Your Venus requirements are +/- 2 steps, your choice in each case.
text.one_time_effect: You start with 50 MC. As your first action, reveal cards from the deck until you have revealed 3 Venus-tag cards. Take those into hand and discard the rest.

text.action_or_effect: Action: Use a blue card action that has already been used this generation.
text.one_time_effect: You start with 48 MC.

text.action_or_effect: Effect: When you play a building tag, you pay 2 MC less for it.
text.one_time_effect: You start with 44 MC and 3 MC production.

text.action_or_effect: Effect: When you play a Earth tag, including this, draw a card.
text.one_time_effect: You start with 38 MC and 1 titanium production.

text.action_or_effect: Action: Spend 4 MC to increase (one of) your LOWEST PRODUCTION 1 step.
text.one_time_effect: You start with 47 MC.

text.action_or_effect: Effect: When you play a science tag, you pay 2 MC less for it.
text.one_time_effect: You start with 37 MC. As your first action, draw 3 Prelude cards, and play one of them. Discard the other two.

text.action_or_effect: Effect: When you play a card with a NON-NEGATIVE VP icon, including this, gain 3 MC.
text.one_time_effect: You start with 45 MC. As your first action, fund an award for free.

text.action_or_effect: Effect: When you get a new type of tag in play (event cards do not count), increase your MC production 1 step.
text.one_time_effect: You start with 40 MC. As your first action, put an additional Colony Tile of your choice into play.

text.action_or_effect: Effect: When you play an animal or plant tag, including this, add 1 animal to this card.
text.one_time_effect: You start with 45 MC. Increase your MC production 2 steps. 1 VP per 2 animals on this card.

text.action_or_effect: Effect: When you buy a card to hand, pay 5 MC instead of 3 MC, including the starting hand.
text.one_time_effect: You start with 50 MC. Increase your MC production 5 steps. Gain 5 titanium.

text.action_or_effect: Effect: When any colony is placed, including this, raise your MC production 1 step.
text.one_time_effect: You start with 45 MC. As your first action, place a colony.

text.action_or_effect: Action: Add 1 floater to ANY card. Effect: Floaters on this card may be used as 2 heat each
text.one_time_effect: You start with 48 MC.
